thread.title: Sorry to ruin your day, but Dev Patel has a girlfriend
thread.title_full: Sorry to ruin your day, but Dev Patel has a girlfriend

author: Krista Jensen
title: Sorry to ruin your day, but Dev Patel has a girlfriend
text:
Sorry to ruin your day, but Dev Patel has a girlfriend “Heartbroken but happy for them,” would be an appropriate emotion right now. As it turns out, everyone’s crush Dev Patel has a girlfriend . Dev, the insanely handsome star of The Newsroom , Slumdog Millionaire, and the Academy Award-winning Lion , has won us over more than ever lately by taking his mom as his date to the Oscars , picking up his co-star little Sunny Pawar for photo-ops, and just plain smiling and looking beautiful while doing it. While we’re happy to learn that he’s happy, it’s like, Dev, how could you? We thought we had something here?
Dev Patel is off the market and the sun is shining a little less bright today. A post shared by Dev Patel ❤️ (@devpateel) on Mar 1, 2017 at 5:42am PST 
The 26-year-old is dating Australian actress Tilda Cobham-Hervey, who is super cute but regretfully, not us.
A post shared by @fameandlove_ on Mar 1, 2017 at 10:32am PST 
Tilda, who is a “circus and physical theater performer” first, has starred in both indie and big screen films since 2013.
A post shared by Manifesto Magazine (@manifestomedia) on Feb 28, 2017 at 10:08pm PST 
The two were seen swinging linked hands and laughing as they strolled through Los Angeles toting a Target bag around like they are just two young pretty people in love or something. The nerve!
Finding out two of your favourite people @tildacobhamhervey and #DevPatel have become your new favourite couple. I love love love this love! #approved ❤️ #TVInsider 
A post shared by Holly Byrnes (@hollybyrnes_news) on Mar 1, 2017 at 5:27am PST 
Before now, Dev had dated Slumdog co-star Frida Pinto until the relationship ran its course in 2014. Since then he’s been seemingly on the market, but who’s to say this new relationship hasn’t low-key been going strong for years?
Look who stopped by the shop today !! #devpatel & #tildacobhamhervey took some time off the sets of #hotelmumbai ... #slumdogmillionaire #lionmovie #themanwhoknewinfinity #igotbakedinbombay #mumbai # ats #instagood #instadaily #ohdough 
A post shared by Oh Dough (@ohdoughmumbai) on Jan 15, 2017 at 2:57am PST 
We’re happy for them. No, really — we only wish the best for you, Dev. We’re moving on… to our new crush, Trevante Rhodes . Bye!
